page.title: 14A day in the life of Glen
page.content: "I wake up at 7.30 am, go to the bathroom to wash and clean my teeth, then get dressed. At 8.00 I have a breakfast of cornflakes, toast and a cup of tea. "At 8.30 my dad drives my friend and I to school, joking that he will take us the seaside, but we always end up at the school gates. "We play football until the bell rings at 9.00. Assembly is first, one of our teachers reads a story, then we say a prayer.Lessons follow until 3.15, with breaks for playtime and lunch. "When I get home I have a drink and biscuit. Tea is at 5.00pm; then I go out to play with my friends. Bedtime is at 9.00pm."
